archetypedescription.p: Witch Hunter are avowed to remove the foul taint of corruption from these lands. A disciplined, well-organized and fanatical group they frequently draw the ire of local monarchs as they can become a credible threat to their power. Similarly the relationship of this group to the College of Magic is one of fractious detante. Each city has a witch-hunter general who oversees operations, coordinates, and shares information with other witch hunter groups.

archetypeinitialabilities.p: All Witchhunters start with the following skills: ✱sword.strike_2, ✱sword.parry_2, ✱language.aquilonian_2, ✱social.etiquette[Witch-Hunters]_3, ✱social.etiquette[Church-of-Mithras]_1, ✱language.merovingian_3, ✱theurgic.lore_1, ✱theurgic.divine_retribution_1, ✱theurgic.grace_of_mithras_1, and ✱theurgic.no_take_me_1.

Choose one of ✱lore.law_1 or ✱lore.antiquarian_1. Choose one of ✱physical.jump_1 or ✱physical.notice_1. Choose one of ✱skulduggery.trap_work_1 or ✱skulduggery.sleight_of_hand_1. Choose one of ✱social.adversary[Dark-Cults]_3 or ✱social.adversary[Spell-Casters]_1. Choose one of ✱luck.nick_of_time_1 or ✱luck.reroll_2. Choose one of ✱theurgic.light_of_mithras_1 or ✱theurgic.turn_undead_1. Choose one of ✱sword.feint_1 or ✱gun.shoot_1.

archetype.startinggear: Cloak, Backpack, Tunic, Hose, Leather Boots, Sack or Leather Belt Pouch, Flint, a Long Sword,Dagger, (eating) dagger, and rations for a week.
